details.title: Overview of the Biological Effects of Electromagnetic Radiation
details.abstract: A brief review is given of some of the problems concerning the interactions of electromagnetic radiation with biological systems. It is emphasized that we cannot continue to expand the use and power of the electromagnetic spectrum without adequate consideration of its possible biological effects. New research efforts must be started in this area, utilizing a strong and well-coordinated interdisciplinary approach.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
